metadata.title: CVE-2017-16137 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The debug module is vulnerable to regular expression denial of service whenuntrusted user input is passed into the o formatter. It takes around 50kcharacters to block for 2 seconds making this a low severity issue.

criterions.comment: node-debug: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
